creator: burkeden@comcast.net
text:
I have a small web site, entirely protected by digest authentication.

From a 163,000 line log file (removed all 4xx error lines), only 10,000 lines 
shows a valid user ID logged with the %u parameter.

There are thousands of lines in the log with a 200 code and the user name 
logged is "-", even though I can find no way to retrieve content from my 
website without authenticating.

Apparently the users had, or it's not configured as you believe.

You don't provide nearly enough information to begin identifying and error,
and confirm that known-auth connections do record the user name.

Please take this back to the peer to peer httpd users list to discuss your
configuration issues, as bugzilla is only for reporting flaws in the source
code of httpd, and is not a user support forum.
creator: wrowe@apache.org
